svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - August 31 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
August 31, 2024" date: "2024-08-31"
Eth News and Links
OpenSea received Wells notice, Maker rebrands to Sky
All core devs
â€¢ All Core Devs â€“ Execution (ACDE) #195 : Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade : Pectra-devnet-3 : launch
once client teams pass spec tests EIP7702 : SELFDESTRUCT behavior clarification and proposals to
change signing domain constant from 0x05 to 0x1a & check chain ID EOF : discussion on ERC721/1155
needs for ISCONTRACT & impact on proxies of DELEGATECALL restriction.Â Scope to remain as is for
Pectra-devnet-4 Proposed Pectra additions : EIP7623 increase calldata cost to reduce max block size by
disincentivizing using mainnet for data availability, already candidate for inclusion EIP7742 uncouple
blob count between CL & EL , moved to candidate for inclusion Increase blob reserve price for faster
price discovery, EIP to be created & proposed for inclusion List of EIPs proposed for inclusion , to
be considered on next ACDE
â€¢ Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade : Pectra-devnet-3 : launch once client teams pass spec tests
EIP7702 : SELFDESTRUCT behavior clarification and proposals to change signing domain constant from
0x05 to 0x1a & check chain ID EOF : discussion on ERC721/1155 needs for ISCONTRACT & impact on proxies
of DELEGATECALL restriction.Â Scope to remain as is for Pectra-devnet-4 Proposed Pectra additions :
EIP7623 increase calldata cost to reduce max block size by disincentivizing using mainnet for data
availability, already candidate for inclusion EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL & EL , moved to
candidate for inclusion Increase blob reserve price for faster price discovery, EIP to be created &
proposed for inclusion List of EIPs proposed for inclusion , to be considered on next ACDE
â€¢ Pectra-devnet-3 : launch once client teams pass spec tests
Pectra-devnet-3 : launch once client teams pass spec tests
â€¢ EIP7702 : SELFDESTRUCT behavior clarification and proposals to change signing domain constant from
0x05 to 0x1a & check chain ID
â€¢ EOF : discussion on ERC721/1155 needs for ISCONTRACT & impact on proxies of DELEGATECALL
restriction.Â Scope to remain as is for Pectra-devnet-4
EOF : discussion on ERC721/1155 needs for ISCONTRACT & impact on proxies of DELEGATECALL restriction.
Scope to remain as is for Pectra-devnet-4
â€¢ Proposed Pectra additions : EIP7623 increase calldata cost to reduce max block size by
Proposed Pectra additions :
â€¢ EIP7623 increase calldata cost to reduce max block size by disincentivizing using mainnet for data
availability, already candidate for inclusion
â€¢ EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL & EL , moved to candidate for inclusion
EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL & EL , moved to candidate for inclusion
â€¢ Increase blob reserve price for faster price discovery, EIP to be created & proposed for inclusion
Increase blob reserve price for faster price discovery, EIP to be created & proposed for inclusion
â€¢ List of EIPs proposed for inclusion , to be considered on next ACDE
List of EIPs proposed for inclusion , to be considered on next ACDE
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade
â€¢ Pectra testing call #2 : Pectra-devnet-2 being left in unhealthy state for debugging
Pectra testing call #2 : Pectra-devnet-2 being left in unhealthy state for debugging
â€¢ PeerDAS cryptography proved secure
PeerDAS cryptography proved secure
Fusaka (Osaka + Fulu) upgrade
â€¢ Verkle implementers call #23 : test framework progressing, 3 clients ready for next testnet and
exploration of binary trees as alternative to Verkle with last minute swap fairly easy
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.4% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.4% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority Consensus layer:
Prysm 36% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 36%
Consensus layer: Prysm 36%
â€¢ Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
â€¢ ePBS: ePBS breakout #8 : client teams working on implementations, support for moving from block
auctions to slot auctions due to free data availability issue Terence: block proposal in ePBS block
auctions is slower than today, less severe in a slot auction
ePBS:
â€¢ ePBS breakout #8 : client teams working on implementations, support for moving from block auctions
to slot auctions due to free data availability issue
ePBS breakout #8 : client teams working on implementations, support for moving from block auctions to
slot auctions due to free data availability issue
â€¢ Terence: block proposal in ePBS block auctions is slower than today, less severe in a slot auction
Terence: block proposal in ePBS block auctions is slower than today, less severe in a slot auction
â€¢ Multi-block MEV analysis : less sequences than statistically expected, payments increase with
sequence length and no indication of deliberate strategies
Multi-block MEV analysis : less sequences than statistically expected, payments increase with sequence
length and no indication of deliberate strategies
â€¢ Portal Network explainer, distributed storage network for Ethereum data
Portal Network explainer, distributed storage network for Ethereum data
Research
â€¢ EF Research team AMA on r/Ethereum September 5, submit your questions
EF Research team AMA on r/Ethereum September 5, submit your questions
â€¢ Execution Tickets economic modeling : captures some but not all MEV, reduces validator set
centralization pressure but doesnâ€™t alleviate builder centralization
Execution Tickets economic modeling : captures some but not all MEV, reduces validator set
â€¢ FOCIL & BRAID compared : FOCIL is add-on to existing protocol to improve censorship resistance,
BRAID is new protocol to improve censorship resistance & solve MEV
FOCIL & BRAID compared : FOCIL is add-on to existing protocol to improve censorship resistance, BRAID
is new protocol to improve censorship resistance & solve MEV
Client Releases
â€¢ Consensus layer: Nimbus v24.8.0 : 25% speed increase for processing blocks with deposits and avoid
running light client sync in background when node is synced
Consensus layer:
â€¢ Nimbus v24.8.0 : 25% speed increase for processing blocks with deposits and avoid running light
client sync in background when node is synced
â€¢ Execution layer: Reth v1.0.6 : adds experimental EngineAPI implementation with 100x improvement on
fork choice update message handling and bug fixes for OP-Reth & RPC
Execution layer:
â€¢ Reth v1.0.6 : adds experimental EngineAPI implementation with 100x improvement on fork choice update
message handling and bug fixes for OP-Reth & RPC
For Stakers
â€¢ Vero : multi-node validator client, uses remote signer
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals):: EIP7761 : IS_CONTRACT instruction (EOF)
â€¢ EIP7761 : IS_CONTRACT instruction (EOF)
Stuff for developers
â€¢ Evm.codes : adds EOF opcodes proposed for Pectra (select EOF fork to view)
Evm.codes : adds EOF opcodes proposed for Pectra (select EOF fork to view)
â€¢ RareSkills: ERC1822 universal upgradeable proxy (UUPS) explainer Guide to OpenZeppelin upgrades
plugin for Foundry
RareSkills:
â€¢ ERC1822 universal upgradeable proxy (UUPS) explainer
ERC1822 universal upgradeable proxy (UUPS) explainer
â€¢ Guide to OpenZeppelin upgrades plugin for Foundry
Guide to OpenZeppelin upgrades plugin for Foundry
â€¢ Kontrol v1 (formal verification): faster & more stable
Kontrol v1 (formal verification): faster & more stable
â€¢ Revm v14 : adds latest spec of EIP7702 (set EOA account code)
Revm v14 : adds latest spec of EIP7702 (set EOA account code)
â€¢ PyXatu (Python package): query Xatu database for execution & consensus layer data
PyXatu (Python package): query Xatu database for execution & consensus layer data
â€¢ Lattice MUD v2.2 (game framework): adds world explorer to view/modify state
Lattice MUD v2.2 (game framework): adds world explorer to view/modify state
â€¢ Guide to create basic zero knowledge proofs (ZKPs) using Circom & Groth16
Guide to create basic zero knowledge proofs (ZKPs) using Circom & Groth16
Security
â€¢ Onchain hack impact estimate : $16M loss, 52% market cap decline, depressed token price for 6+
months, 3 months recovery effort & platforms (chain or primitive) are wiped out
Onchain hack impact estimate : $16M loss, 52% market cap decline, depressed token price for 6+ months,
3 months recovery effort & platforms (chain or primitive) are wiped out
â€¢ Optimization bug found in LLVM (used by ZKsync compiler) while testing Aave deployment, doesnâ€™t
affect 64 bit machines but impacted 256 bit EVM
Optimization bug found in LLVM (used by ZKsync compiler) while testing Aave deployment, doesnâ€™t affect
64 bit machines but impacted 256 bit EVM
Ecosystem
â€¢ Josh Stark: EF spending , ~38% internal (EF teams) & ~62% external (grants) in 2022/23
Josh Stark: EF spending , ~38% internal (EF teams) & ~62% external (grants) in 2022/23
â€¢ EF Q2 grantees share $8M in funding
EF Q2 grantees share $8M in funding
â€¢ ETHTokyo hackathon projects
ETHTokyo hackathon projects
â€¢ Suggest a city for ETHGlobal 2025
Suggest a city for ETHGlobal 2025
â€¢ ETHGas : gas explorer, beta
ETHGas : gas explorer, beta
Job Listings
â€¢ Gnosis seek CoreDevs , Sr Algorithm Engineer , Sr Smart Contract Engineer
Gnosis seek CoreDevs , Sr Algorithm Engineer , Sr Smart Contract Engineer
â€¢ Join Witnet as a Community Builder ! Full-time, remote opportunity.
Join Witnet as a Community Builder ! Full-time, remote opportunity.
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
â€¢ Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 0.5 to 18.7 gwei, 1.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.9
gwei 17k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
â€¢ Gas: 0.5 to 18.7 gwei, 1.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.9 gwei
Gas: 0.5 to 18.7 gwei, 1.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.9 gwei
â€¢ 17k ETH net issuance this week
17k ETH net issuance this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $2,409 - $2,809, currently $2,528, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $2,409 - $2,809, currently $2,528, all time high $4,878
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.043 (Flippening at ~0.164)
ETHBTC : currently 0.043 (Flippening at ~0.164)
Notable at app layer
â€¢ Maker rebranded to Sky : USDS stablecoin ( freezable in future upgrade ) & SKY governance token
launch September 18, rewards exclude US, UK & VPN users MakerDAO Twitter handle snatched
Maker rebranded to Sky : USDS stablecoin ( freezable in future upgrade ) & SKY governance token launch
September 18, rewards exclude US, UK & VPN users
â€¢ MakerDAO Twitter handle snatched
â€¢ Polygon MATIC migration to POL , manual on Ethereum, automatic on Polygon PoS
Polygon MATIC migration to POL , manual on Ethereum, automatic on Polygon PoS
â€¢ 100x prediction markets [ Starbloom portfolio]
100x prediction markets [ Starbloom portfolio]
â€¢ Linkdrop Soulbounds : create/claim non-transferrable NFTs on Base
Linkdrop Soulbounds : create/claim non-transferrable NFTs on Base
Regulation/business/tokens
â€¢ OpenSea received Wells notice from SEC, NFTs on the platform alleged to be securities
General
â€¢ Telegram CEO Pavel Durov arrested in France [French & English], released on â‚¬5M bail & ban on
leaving France [French] Reminder: Telegram chats are probably visible on their servers as not end to
end encrypted unless secret chats enabled
Telegram CEO Pavel Durov arrested in France [French & English], released on â‚¬5M bail & ban on leaving
France [French]
â€¢ Reminder: Telegram chats are probably visible on their servers as not end to end encrypted unless
secret chats enabled
â€¢ North Korean hackers targeting crypto exploited Chrome zero-day to deploy rootkit
North Korean hackers targeting crypto exploited Chrome zero-day to deploy rootkit
â€¢ Intel SGX encrypted root provisioning key extracted
Intel SGX encrypted root provisioning key extracted
